section.title: Description
section.p: An assessment of whether the reaction / adverse event may have been caused by or exacerbated by the product cited by the owning ProductEventRelationship class.

stentry.p: "The method of the assessment provided in G.k.9.i.2.r.3.For example global introspection, algorithm, Bayesian calculation, etc." - ICH E2B(R3), G.k.9.i.2.r.2.
"The result of the assessment for relatedness. The value will depend on the method used for the assessment" - ICH E2B(R3), G.k.9.i.2.r.3.
"The source of the assessment provided in G.k.9.i.2.r.3." - ICH E2B(R3), G.k.9.i.2.r.1.
